text: Arrā wa tada tsugi no yōna mono o, anata gata ni kinji rareru. Shūkyō-jō no koto de anata gata to tatakai o majieta mono, mata anata gata o ie kara tsuihō shita mono, anata gata o tsuihō suru ni atari-ryoku o kashita-sha-tachidearu. Kare-ra ni enko o tsūjiru no o (kinji rareru). Dare demo kare-ra o shinmitsuna tomo to suru mono wa fugi o okonau monodearu
